import React from 'react' import styles from './HeroSection.css' import { Button } from './Button' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './ProjectSection.css' import './Button.css' function HeroSection({ exactClassName, topLine, lightText, lightTextDesc, headline, description, buttonLabel, img, heroimg, alt, imgStart }) { return (
{topLine}

{headline}

{description}

); } export default HeroSection;
